response.overview: When Bury FC collapsed last August 2019, a group of locals made it their mission to bring football back to their town against massive odds. Bury FC was one of the oldest clubs in English football. It had been at the heart of the local community for more than 130 years. When the club was expelled from the English Football League, local pubs were suddenly empty, the takeaways had no customers and Bury's market was deserted.
response.title: Bury: Bringing Football Back
